dimension.description: The namespace and ID of the dimension the player should spawn in.

biome.description: If specified, the player will only spawn in the biome that matches the specified namespace and ID.

structure.description: If specified, the player will only spawn in the specified namespace and ID of the structure. **The structure needs to generate in the specified dimension.**

spawn_strategy.description: Determines whether the player should spawn near the world spawnpoint (0, 0) of the dimension (`"center"`) or near the coordinates of the Overworld spawnpoint (whilst considering the value of the `dimension_distance_multiplier` field) (`"default"`).

dimension_distance_multiplier.description: Defines the ratio of Overworld blocks to blocks in the specified dimension. e.g: for The Nether dimension, this would be set to `0.125`. **This needs to be set when `spawn_strategy` is set to `"default"`**
